Json (PHP Class)
============

To include in your project, add these lines to composer.json

```
    "repositories": [
        {
            "type": "vcs",
            "url": "https://github.com/mozilla-l10n/phpclass-json"
        }
    ],

    "require": {
        "mozillal10n/json" : "dev-master"
    },    
```
